Home.email_modal_title: Subscribe to our newsletter and be the first to know about our whitelist release.
Home.submit_success: You have successfully subscribed to our newsletter.
Home.story_introduce: Moonbox blends the world of web3 with AI-powered interactive storytelling. Our NFTs are more than just art; they’re your personal AI character, designed to converse and immerse you in a unique narrative journey. Keep an eye out for the debut of Nobody NFT collection.
Home.ai_sayhi: Is anyone there? I’m really scared right now. Can someone come and help me? The bus I’m on is on fire! I have no idea where I will drift to. (The director’s body was injured, and his consciousness began to blur. Hazy and disoriented, he noticed another form of himself not far away, looking at his trapped self inside the bus. Suddenly, he realized, “That must be my soul!” Something extraordinary happened: his soul started to speak to him.)
Home.chapter_one_description: At full speed, the Spacebus embarks on a mysterious journey with 10K aliens with enthusiasm on board.
Home.chapter_two_description: The Spacebus breaks down for no reason, leaving The Director hovering in the space and drifting to nowhere.
Home.chapter_three_description: Along with other passengers, The Director lands on earth. An unexpected adventure awaits.
Home.nobody_theme_song: NOBODY NFT THEME SONG GLOBAL PREMIERE
Home.nobody_story_content: It unfolds across the Trilogy: Spacebus, Accident, and Arrival. The passengers find themselves compelled to land on Earth due to a mechanical failure of the Spacebus. In an effort to protect themselves and their home planet, these extraterrestrial beings clandestinely merged with Earthlings, relinquishing their true identities.</br></br> Thus, they transformed into Nobody: an enigmatic presence with an unknown identity.Dive into the Nobody universe with Moonbox, an AI powered app for Nobody collection. Beyond beautiful images, Moonbox adds a new dimension, letting you chat with any Nobody NFT character for an immersive journey into their unique stories.</br></br>Uncover the mysteries of Nobody NFT firsthand with the Moonbox app. Unveil the untold yourself.
Home.nobody_content_1: Nobody NFT blends the world of web3 with AI-powered interactive story telling.
Home.nobody_content_2: Each Nobody NFT is a living character.
Home.nobody_content_3: Talk to your beloved characters and learn about their unique stories.
Home.appSubtitle:
Every Nobody NFT is alive.

NFT holders can customize their own AI characters. Play with your favorite characters to create your own unique story.
Home.privacyPolicyIntro: Please read and understand the "User Agreement" and "Privacy Policy" carefully. We highly value your privacy and personal data protection. During your use of "Dream A Superstar" services, we may collect, process, and use some personal data for the following purposes:
Home.privacyPolicyPoint1: Apply and use necessary device information and permissions, such as location, camera, microphone, and photo album, for registration, recording, uploading, and identity verification.
Home.privacyPolicyPoint2: Collect account data and competition content (name, contact information, city, works, and interaction records) for account management, competition arrangements, rankings, and judging.
Home.privacyPolicyPoint3: Use necessary cookies and similar technologies to maintain login, record preferences, and improve services; with your consent, they may be used for activities and marketing notifications.
Home.privacyPolicyPoint4: Conduct anti-cheating and risk monitoring to ensure security and fair competition, and handle violations.
Home.privacyPolicyPoint5: Within the scope of authorization or legal permission, use your nickname, avatar, and competition content for promotion on official platforms and partner media.
Home.privacyPolicyPoint6: When necessary for service provision or compliance with laws, share necessary data with entrusted partners and require them to comply with confidentiality and information security obligations.
Home.privacyPolicyRights: You may exercise rights such as inquiry, viewing, copying, supplementing and correction, stopping processing, and deletion in accordance with applicable laws. Contact information can be found in the customer service information in the "Privacy Policy".
Home.privacyPolicyMinor: Users under 18 must obtain consent from legal guardians before using and participating.
Home.privacyPolicyDetails: Detailed content is subject to the "User Agreement" and "Privacy Policy".
Home.privacyPolicyAgreement: Clicking "Agree" indicates that you have read, understood, and agreed to all the content of the aforementioned documents.

Declaration.subtitle1:
Adhering to the community spirit defined by Mr. Stephen Chow, the First Creator of Nobody, we firmly believe in the idea that "Every nobody is somebody."



We encourage everyone not to be limited by their identity, status, or any other labels. No matter what role you play in the real life, as long as you are willing to keep working hard and fight relentlessly, you will eventually leave a dent in the universe.



We all deserve respect and attention, and equally possess irreplaceable value. While looking up to great people, don't forget to cheer for ourselves as well!
Declaration.subtitle2:
"Set a stage for everyone and their talents to shine."



Behind every great Web3 project is a strong community, and we aim to follow this excellent tradition to build the best community ever! We are committed to providing opportunities and support for every nobody, allowing them to fully utilize their talents to achieve greatness.



We are creating a promised land where everyone can find their place by providing resources and opportunities to make personal growth and prosperity possible. In doing so, everyone could be drivers of value creation.
Declaration.subtitle3:
Nobody is a NFT collection launched jointly by Nobody and Mr. Stephen Chow, Nobody First Creator, with 10K in total. Owning a Nobody NFT grants you the chance to become part of Nobody. You will participate in the project's development, and enjoy many privileges, including but not limited to proposing, co-creating, voting, and creating with Nobody IP.



What makes Nobody NFT special is that each Nobody NFT represents a vivid character with its own story. Holders can interact with these characters through the Nobody App, understanding their personalities, hobbies, backgrounds and shaping their future.



We also strive to build the Nobody IP, combining Mr. Stephen Chow's previous experience and new mechanisms. Through various forms of works, we aim to bring Nobody IP to the public eye, breaking through the barriers that have previously prevented Web3 native IPs from entering the mainstream Web2 market.
Declaration.subtitle4:
Centered on "laughter", "creation", and "sharing", the Nobody community will exhibit openness and inclusivity, striving to break traditional boundaries. We encourage everyone to display their talents to create diverse and vibrant works.



We will be focusing on providing resources and opportunities for the community to join the film and short video creation, including but not limited to co-creating movie clips from Mr. Stephen Chow's "The Mermaid 2", "Shaolin Women's Soccer" and casting for future works. We will also actively build on the Nobody IP in various forms. What’s more, Nobody will seek to expand into more fields, such as fashion, art, music, etc., to call upon every nobody and co-create quality content for both Web2 and Web3.

Rule.content1:
1. Minting time:

Feb 1, 2024, 8:00 PM (UTC+8) to Feb 3, 2024, 8:00 PM (UTC+8).



2. Minting price:

0.19527E + gas fee



3. Nobody NFT collection size:

10,000 Nobody NFTs



4. Number of available Nobody NFTs for minting and Whitelists:

Both are 9,500.



The rest 500 will be allocated as follows:

Investors: 350

Nobody Team: 50

Friends and family: 50

Community Development Fund: 50



Any unminted Nobody NFTs will go to the Treasury after the minting period ends.



5. Who is eligible to mint?

Anyone can participate in the minting of Nobody NFTs.



Whitelist holders have the highest priority and are guaranteed to mint a Nobody NFT during the minting period. You do not need to rush.



Check your eligibility: visit nobody.xyz/mint; connect wallet.



Non-whitelist holders still have a chance to mint an NFT through raffle. If a non-whitelist holder makes the deposit within one hour after the minting starts, he/she will receive a 9.527x boost in the raffle. A successful deposit would imply that the user joins the raffle.



The allocation of NFTs for the raffle depends on the number of whitelist holders who make the deposit. For example, if there are 4,500 Whitelist holders and 10,000 non-whitelist holders who make the deposit by the end of the Minting period, there will be 5,000 NFTs for the raffle (9,500-4,500). The results of the raffle will be announced within 24 hours after the minting period ends.



6. How many Nobody NFTs can be minted per wallet?

Each wallet address can only mint one Nobody NFT.



7. Which wallet address should I use for minting?

If you have a Whitelist, the minting wallet is the wallet address that you directly submitted to us or indirectly through our launching partners. If you are a non-whitelist holder, feel free to mint with any of your ERC20 wallet address.



8. When will the reveals take place?

Feb 7, 2024.



9. What is the royalty and how will it be used?

5%. We will use the funds to hire more full-time team members, fund operations, and provide more value to the Nobody community.
Rule.content2:
1. Raffle and Airdrop Time:

Feb 3, 2024, 8:00 PM (UTC+8) to Feb 4, 2024, 8 PM (UTC+8).



2. Raffle and Airdrop Details:

If you have a Whitelist and successfully mint an Nobody NFT, we will airdrop it to your minting wallet within 24 hours after the minting ends in the form of a Mystery Box. No further action is required.



If you are a non-whitelist holder and join the raffle, you could check the status of the raffle on the minting page in 24 hours after the minting ends (Mint page: nobody.xyz/mint).



We will also release the list of successful mints on Nobody's social media. As long as your wallet address appears on the list, you will be guaranteed to receive the NFT airdrop. No further action is required.
Rule.content3:
1. Refund time:

Feb 4, 2024, 8:00 PM (UTC+8) to Jul 4, 2024, 8 PM (UTC+8).



2. Refund details:

If you don’t win the raffle when you check the status after connecting the wallet, it means you do not mint the Nobody NFT successfully.



Refund ends on July 4, 2024.

Show.title: “Nobody Imitation Show” Finals
Show.topic: Theme: Imitate or adapt classic scenes from Stephen Chow’s works, and showcase your creativity and acting skills! The Nobody team will first select 30 finalists based on the quality of works, then the top 5 winners will be chosen by votes from Nobody NFT holders.
Show.encourage: Rewards: The top 5 winners will receive a mystery gift, in addition to the opportunity to participate in Stephen Chow’s future works, and the chance to meet Stephen Chow in person! All participants who vote will be eligible to share the royalties of Nobody NFT from Feb 20 to Mar 26 equally according to the number of votes.
Show.rule1: Voting lasts from 8PM, Mar 27th to 8PM, Mar 30th.
Show.rule2: Wallet addresses that have held a Nobody NFT for more than 72 hours are eligible to vote.
Show.rule3: One eligible Nobody NFT equals one vote.
Show.rule4: Votes cannot be modified or retracted. Please vote at your discretion.
Show.rule5: Holders may distribute multiple votes to different works.
Show.votingDescription: ETH will go to your wallet once calculation is completed
Show.author: Creator: {author}
Show.availableDescription:
Available = Total Available - Voted

*based on the number of NFTs on 3.27 19:00

Show.understand: I understand the voting rules for The Imitation Show.
Show.sorry: Sorry! You need Nobody NFTs to participate in

Show.pc: Please use PC to visit this page.

TalkShow.title: Nobody Talk Show Finals
TalkShow.topic: Theme: Produce a humorous short video no longer than 60 seconds. The Nobody team will first select 10 finalists based on the quality of the works, and then the top 2 winners will be chosen by a vote from Nobody NFT holders.
TalkShow.encourage: Prizes for the winners: In addition to the opportunity to appear in a future film or television production by Stephen Chow, the community voting winners will also be able to participate in the live recording of the iQIYI-produced comedy show "King of Comedy". All wallet addresses that participate in the voting will be able to share the royalty revenue of Nobody NFT trading from May 8th to June 8th, based on the number of votes they cast.
TalkShow.rule1: Voting lasts from 8PM, Jun 10th to 8PM, Jun 13th.
TalkShow.rule2: Wallet addresses that have held a Nobody NFT for more than 72 hours are eligible to vote.
TalkShow.rule3: One eligible Nobody NFT equals one vote.
TalkShow.rule4: Votes cannot be modified or retracted. Please vote at your discretion.
TalkShow.rule5: Holders may distribute multiple votes to different works.

Bid.desc1: Visual age 25, male. Simple and kind, strong sense of justice. Simple-minded, likes to chuckle foolishly, often appears not very smart. Although he may not come up with solutions to problems immediately, given some time, he will have great ideas.
Bid.desc2: Visual age 25, female. Straightforward and spicy personality, cold and fierce combat power. Obsessed with mechanics, skilled in racing, modified her own car, turning an ordinary car into one that can travel by land, sea, and air. She never talks much about things she can handle herself.
Bid.desc3: Visual age 28, female. Has medium-long hair, a low ponytail, an oval face, and is gentle. She is anxiously holding the baby, showing a motherly glow.
Bid.desc4: Visual age 80, male. Has white hair, a white beard, a face that looks young for his age, talks unclearly, smiles oddly, and talks seriously but nonsensically.
Bid.desc5: Visual age 35, male. Recently promoted to an important position, wears glasses, is smartly dressed in a suit, has well-groomed hair, and is full of energy.
Bid.desc6: Visual age 24, female. Wearing professional attire, slim, holding a bag, looking scared and in a rush to get home.
Bid.desc7: Visual age 35, female. A mother holding her child, both looking down and rushing back home.
Bid.desc8: Visual age 5, male. Being led by his mother, both looking down and hurrying home.
Bid.desc9: Visual age 45, male. Bald, slightly overweight, wearing a tank top and baggy shorts, flip-flops, looking a bit messy.
Bid.desc10: Visual age 7, male. An orphaned, skinny boy, shy but with bright eyes.
Bid.desc11: Visual age 16, female. A young Daoist in Daoist robes, with a cool attitude and speaks quietly.
Bid.bidDesc: When you place a bid, you commit that if you win the auction, your NFT will automatically become a character in the short drama.
Bid.itemSpecDesc:
Event Duration: From now until 23:59 on October 27, 2024 (UTC+8)

Eligibility: Ownership of Nobody NFT required

Accepted Currency: USDT (ERC20)

Event Overview: Each role has one slot, and each NFT can be elected for at most one role. Holders need to link their wallets to participate in the bidding. When a successful bid is made, USDT will be directly transferred to the designated wallet for this event. If another holder places a higher bid for the same character, the previous bid will be refunded (gas fee to be borne by the participant). At the end of the event, the NFT of the holder with the highest bid for a character will secure the role. The final list of characters will be approved by the Nobody team, who reserves the right for the ultimate decision.

Bid.nobodySquareIntro:
In 2049, a dangerous virus, the ‘Laughing Black Mist’, ravages Hong Kong.

A person infected with the virus will vomit blood and die if they start laughing.

Unless, a hero appears and finds the four legendary beasts, HK is doomed!

It's time for Nobody squad to save the world!
Bid.nobodySquareDesc: "Every Nobody is Somebody! " Content creation has always been at the core value of Nobody. This groundbreaking use of AI technology to create short drama stories breathes new life into Nobody NFTs. Not only targeting audiences from Web2 and Web3 at the same time, but it also pioneers a new era of collaboration between NFTs and AI. As a holder, you can nominate your NFTs to participate in the casting/bidding event for the production of  'The Nobody Squad' that will be 100% generated by AI. Successfully selected NFTs will portray characters in this short drama and make a screen debut!
Bid.eventDescription: Each role has one slot, and each NFT can be elected for at most one role. Holders need to link their wallets to participate in the bidding. When a successful bid is made, USDT will be directly transferred to the designated wallet for this event. If another holder places a higher bid for the same character, the previous bid will be refunded (gas fee to be borne by the participant). At the end of the event, the NFT of the holder with the highest bid for a character will secure the role. The final list of characters will be approved by the Nobody team, who reserves the right for the ultimate decision.
Bid.industryLeader: A top AIGC film and television producer in the industry. He has directed the fully AI-generated series 'Mirror of Fantasies' with over 52 million views across five episodes on Kuaishou!
Bid.genderConsistencyWarning: Note: Holders must ensure the gender consistency between their NFT and the character, as any discrepancies may result in disqualification.
Bid.windDesc: The final list of characters will be subject to approval by the Nobody team, who retains the ultimate decision-making authority.

Impact.desc1: Born into a martial arts family, Sunny aspired to become a kung fu actor after watching martial arts films as a teenager. Now a superstar, he is rumored to be the true inheritor of ancient Han martial arts. His signature move is a palm strike that descends from the heavens.
Impact.desc2: A mysterious presence often seen traveling between the set and a mental hospital. He enjoys discussing Spielberg’s work and once claimed Spielberg consulted him about the script for Jurassic Park 24.
Impact.desc3: The top-notch production assistant. She loves smoking and manages every detail of the crew’s needs. Known for her loud voice, she’s famous for her temper—never cross her, or you might want to check your lunchbox carefully.
Impact.desc4: A lighting technician on set, Lazy Wah enjoys wandering around and chatting with young women. Rumor has it his connections are powerful—he’s supposedly the online friend of the aunt of the neighbor of the classmate of the director’s sister’s Mahjong buddy. No one dares mess with him.
Impact.desc5: A hairstylist with unshaken dreams of becoming a great musician. Every client is charged only 50 cents—fair and honest business for all.
Impact.desc6: After the recruitment campaign, the Nobody and Salvo Games teams will collaborate to design custom roles tailored for the NFTs.
Impact.desc7: After the recruitment campaign, the Nobody and Salvo Games teams will collaborate to design custom roles tailored for the NFTs.

Impact.nobodySquareIntro:
During the golden age of Hong Kong cinema, kung fu movies were all the rage, captivating audiences across Southeast Asia. Now, the film set is gearing up to rehearse the most critical scene from the latest action blockbuster, Project D—the final showdown. You will play an indispensable role in this production as an extra, working alongside kung fu superstar Sunny.

(*Production assistant Hajeh: "Why are you just arriving now? Coming straight from another set, huh? Oh well, it’s just a rehearsal. No need to change your outfit. Just coordinate with Sunny and play your part getting knocked out. Don’t worry, you’ll get an extra egg in your lunchbox! Now hurry onto the set!")
Impact.nobodySquareDesc:
"Every Nobody is Somebody!" Content creation has always been at the heart of Nobody's core values. This time, we’re collaborating with Salvo Games to create a Nobody-themed mini-game, attracting both Web2 and Web3 gamers to join the Nobody ecosystem and breathe new life into Nobody NFTs!



As a Nobody NFT holder, you can nominate your NFTs to participate in the character selection/bidding event for Nobody Impact. The winning NFTs will be featured as characters in this mini-game.
Impact.eventDescription: Each role has one slot, and each NFT can be elected for at most one role. Holders need to link their wallets to participate in the bidding. When a successful bid is made, USDT will be directly transferred to the designated wallet for this event. If another holder places a higher bid for the same character, the previous bid will be refunded (gas fee to be borne by the participant). At the end of the event, the NFT of the holder with the highest bid for a character will secure the role. The final list of characters will be approved by the Nobody team, who reserves the right for the ultimate decision.
Impact.industryLeader:
Salvo is a next-generation Web3 gaming platform that bridges Web2 game developers and players into the blockchain ecosystem through seamless onboarding and scalable user acquisition. By offering end-to-end solutions such as tokenization, wallet integration, and multi-chain support, Salvo enables high-quality Web2 games to transition into the Web3 space effortlessly. Salvo aims to create a sustainable ecosystem where players, developers, and publishers collaborate to redefine gaming and drive mass adoption of blockchain technology.

Unleash limitless adventures for millions of gamers across multi-chain worlds and in-game economies!
Impact.genderConsistencyWarning: Note: Holders must ensure the gender consistency between their NFT and the character, as any discrepancies may result in disqualification.
Impact.windDesc: The final list of characters will be subject to approval by the Nobody team, who retains the ultimate decision-making authority.

Hares.nobodySquareIntro:
On a rainy and misty night, the legendary "Ghost Night" has once again arrived. Every time this night descends, ghosts and spirits return from the underworld, wandering through the city to fulfill their unfinished wishes and seek revenge on the living.



As a member of a ghostbuster team, players possess the ability to capture and banish ghosts and spirits. By working closely with teammates, they can hunt down ghosts and collect Yin Virtue (spiritual points). Capturing special spirits may even grant unique abilities. Players can deposit their earned Yin Virtue into Karma Circles scattered throughout the city to accumulate points and take control of these zones.



However, your team is not the only one in town. On Ghost Night, rival ghostbuster teams will also flock to the city, competing to "seize business." In addition to capturing ghosts, you must fight against opposing teams to steal their Yin Virtue and claim victory.
Hares.nobodySquareDesc:
"Every Nobody is Somebody!"

Content creation has always been at the heart of Nobody's core values. This time, we’re collaborating with Planet Hares to create a Nobody-themed game, attracting both Web2 and Web3 gamers to join the Nobody ecosystem and breathe new life into Nobody NFTs!



As a Nobody NFT holder, you can nominate your NFTs to participate in the character selection/bidding event for Nobody Jackpot. The winning NFTs will be featured as characters in this game.
Hares.eventDescription: Each role has one slot, and each NFT can be elected for at most one role. Holders need to link their wallets to participate in the bidding. When a successful bid is made, USDT will be directly transferred to the designated wallet for this event. If another holder places a higher bid for the same character, the previous bid will be refunded (gas fee to be borne by the participant). At the end of the event, the NFT of the holder with the highest bid for a character will secure the role. The final list of characters will be approved by the Nobody team, who reserves the right for the ultimate decision.
Hares.industryLeader: Planet Hares is the first 3D metaverse platform designed to run within Web3 wallets. It integrates games, branded community building, fashion IP, original novels, and AI digital characters, aiming to create a Web3 ecosystem with tens of millions of users. It provides various application scenarios and services for different communities and partners.
Hares.genderConsistencyWarning: Note: Holders must ensure the gender consistency between their NFT and the character, as any discrepancies may result in disqualification.
Hares.windDesc: The final list of characters will be subject to approval by the Nobody team, who retains the ultimate decision-making authority.

Music.nobodySquareIntro: Every month, Fireverse generates 10 AI songs. Contestants can freely choose a song to showcase their personal talent and style.
Music.highlights: Every month, Fireverse generates 10 AI songs. Contestants can freely choose a song to showcase their personal talent and style.
Music.schedule:
• Day 1–15 of each month: Accept work submissions, each person can submit at most once per month

• Day 1–15 of next month: Open for public voting

• Day 1 of the month after voting ends: Announce winners and final scores (including jury scores)
Music.scoringMechanismDetails:
• 40% Professional jury scoring

- Pitch 10/10

- Rhythm 10/10

- Enunciation 10/10

- Technique 10/10

- Emotion 10/10

• 60% Public voting
Music.votingMethod:
• Each Nobody NFT = equivalent to 200 USDT votes

• The rounded value of $AICE or $FIR after conversion to USDT equals the number of votes. Exchange rates are settled daily at 18:00 Hong Kong time.

• Minimum voting amount must be equivalent to 10 USDT

• Final ranking is determined by total number of votes
Music.prizeDistributionTitle: Prize Distribution (Nobody NFT votes not counted for prize calculation)
Music.prizeDistribution:
• Champion: Receives 70% of individual vote amount (excluding Nobody NFT votes)

• 1st Runner-up: Receives 60% of individual vote amount (excluding Nobody NFT votes)

• 2nd Runner-up: Receives 50% of individual vote amount (excluding Nobody NFT votes)

• 4th–10th Place: Receives 40% of individual vote amount (excluding Nobody NFT votes)
Music.juryMembers:
• Nobody Marketing Manager @Sarah So

• Fireverse Marketing Director @Ray Yu

• Aicean Marketing Director @BitcoinMan
Music.rewards:
1. Official song release and music publishing royalties

2. Subject to regulatory approval, minimum 10 million views exposure in Chinese-speaking markets

3. Outstanding winners with high potential may be invited for artist interviews and contract opportunities with Bingo Group.
Music.submitFailedButUploaded: Failed to submit work, but file uploaded successfully
Music.fillCompleteInfo: Please fill in complete information: select sample song and upload work file
Music.invalidFileType: Unsupported file type. Only MP3, WAV, OGG, M4A, AAC, FLAC formats are supported
Music.fileTooLarge: File too large. Maximum supported size is 50MB
Music.supportedFormats: Supports MP3, WAV, OGG, M4A, AAC, FLAC formats, max 50MB
Music.competitionTerms1:
• Contestants may only use designated competition music downloaded from Fireverse for creation and submission purposes in this competition.

• Contestants may not upload or repost related songs to any social media platforms other than personal accounts, nor use them for any commercial purposes or engage in activities that infringe third-party rights.

• If found in violation of the above regulations, the organizer has the right to immediately disqualify the contestant from participation or eligibility for any prizes, and reserves the right to pursue legal action and claim compensation for all related losses.
Music.competitionTerms2:
Non-winning entries:

Upon submission, all copyrights of participating works belong to the organizers.



Winning entries:

Organizers have the right to invite original contestants of winning works to professionally record the song with their own vocals, produce complete songs and release them on major music platforms. After deducting related costs from the revenue generated by the work, contestants can receive 4% partial royalty revenue.



All copyrights and related rights of winning works belong to the organizers. Organizers have unlimited use, transfer, sale, and licensing rights to the work, and can independently decide any form of commercial or non-commercial use. Contestants may not raise any objections.



Contestants also have priority performance rights to the work.



Organizers also reserve the right to rename, modify, adapt, cover, or make other content adjustments to winning works. Contestants may not raise any objections.
Music.competitionTerms3:
• All prize money will be distributed in $AICE and $FIR token form.

• Physical prizes (including but not limited to Korea professional training program) will not be converted to cash or other tokens.

• If contestants are unable to participate in related physical rewards or activities (including but not limited to Korea professional training program) due to personal schedule arrangements or force majeure factors (including but not limited to illness, travel delays, natural disasters, epidemic, visa issues, etc.), the reward will be considered automatically forfeited with no compensation or alternative arrangements.
Music.competitionTerms4:
• Organizers welcome contestants to conduct vote-seeking and promotional activities on personal social media accounts to promote their entries.

• After works are selected, contestants may not independently publicize or disclose related information. All external publicity must obtain written consent and confirmation from organizers in advance.
Music.competitionTerms5:
• Every contestant, regardless of winning status, may re-enter each month with new works for evaluation.

• Contestants must be individuals aged 18 or above, no location restrictions, all can register to participate.
Music.competitionTerms6:
• reserves the right to make the final interpretation and decision.

• Submission, Voting, Results Announcement: nobody.xyz

Music.privacyPolicyIntro: Please read and understand the "User Agreement" and "Privacy Policy" carefully. We highly value your privacy and personal data protection. During your use of "Dream A Superstar" services, we may collect, process, and use some personal data for the following purposes:
Music.privacyPolicyPoint1: Apply and use necessary device information and permissions, such as location, camera, microphone, and photo album, for registration, recording, uploading, and identity verification.
Music.privacyPolicyPoint2: Collect account data and competition content (name, contact information, city, works, and interaction records) for account management, competition arrangements, rankings, and judging.
Music.privacyPolicyPoint3: Use necessary cookies and similar technologies to maintain login, record preferences, and improve services; with your consent, they may be used for activities and marketing notifications.
Music.privacyPolicyPoint4: Conduct anti-cheating and risk monitoring to ensure security and fair competition, and handle violations.
Music.privacyPolicyPoint5: Within the scope of authorization or legal permission, use your nickname, avatar, and competition content for promotion on official platforms and partner media.
Music.privacyPolicyPoint6: When necessary for service provision or compliance with laws, share necessary data with entrusted partners and require them to comply with confidentiality and information security obligations.
Music.privacyPolicyRights: You may exercise rights such as inquiry, viewing, copying, supplementing and correction, stopping processing, and deletion in accordance with applicable laws. Contact information can be found in the customer service information in the "Privacy Policy".
Music.privacyPolicyMinor: Users under 18 must obtain consent from legal guardians before using and participating.
Music.privacyPolicyDetails: Detailed content is subject to the "User Agreement" and "Privacy Policy".
Music.privacyPolicyAgreement: Clicking "Agree" indicates that you have read, understood, and agreed to all the content of the aforementioned documents.
Music.downloadUsageContent:
Contestants may only use designated competition music downloaded from Fireverse for creation and submission purposes in this competition.

Contestants may not upload or repost related songs to any social media platforms other than personal accounts, nor use them for any commercial purposes or engage in activities that infringe third-party rights.

If found in violation of the above regulations, the organizer has the right to immediately disqualify the contestant from participation and winning, and reserves the right to pursue legal action and claim compensation for all related losses.
Music.nobodyVoteLimit: Each NFT can vote once per month
Music.voteExplanationText: Enter the number of votes, the contract will automatically convert to the corresponding token amount based on the selected voting method
